summary: Data structure that encapsulates the outputs of a decoder‑only language model when generation is performed with beam search, including the generated token sequences and optional tensors such as beam scores, logits, beam indices, attention maps, hidden states, and cached key/value tensors.
business_intent: Provide a unified, easy‑to‑access representation of beam‑generated text and its associated diagnostic information so that applications can evaluate, rank, or further process generated candidates in NLP pipelines.
